sentences.en: 1,000 people marched, beating drums and carrying flags.
a 5 gallon oil drum
a big bass drum
a brake drum
A long drum roll introduced the trapeze artists.
sentences.cn: 长长的一阵紧锣密鼓声中迎来了高空秋千表演者。

sentences.en: drum up new business.
drummed up an alibi.
sentences.cn: 编造不在做案现场证据

sentences.en: he bangs the drum of the free market.
He gave the drum a bang.
He had found a drum of electric cable.
he was &B{drummed out of} the air force.
His ghost is said to haunt some of the rooms, banging a toy drum.
sentences.cn: 据说他的鬼魂经常敲着玩具鼓出没在其中的一些房间里。

sentences.en: I could hear the rain drumming against the windows.
sentences.cn: 我听到雨滴有节奏地打在窗上的声音。

sentences.en: it had been drummed into them to dress correctly.
sentences.cn: 他们曾被反复地告知要正确着装。

sentences.en: Jones played the drums in an all-girl band.
sentences.cn: 琼斯在一个女子乐队里打鼓。

sentences.en: Let's drum up some buyers for our new products.
sentences.cn: 我们为我们的新产品揽一些顾客.

sentences.en: Lisa drummed her fingers impatiently on the table.
sentences.cn: 莉萨不耐烦地用手指嗒嗒地敲桌子。

sentences.en: Our teacher used to drum our multiplication tables into us.
sentences.cn: 我们老师过去老是让我们反覆背诵乘法表.

sentences.en: The drum is one of the oldest musical instruments.
sentences.cn: 鼓是最古老的乐器之一。

sentences.en: The oil drum leaks.
the organizers are hoping to drum up support from local businesses.
sentences.cn: 组织者想要竭力争取地方企业的支持。

sentences.en: The skin of the drum is taut.
The teacher was determined to drum some elementary arithmetic in.
sentences.cn: 教师决心把一些基本的算术知识装进学生的头脑中去.

sentences.en: The war drum is beating.
They beat the drum for freedom.
We heard the beat of a drum.
What I didn't expect was a bandmaster and the bang of a drum!
sentences.cn: 但我万万没想到会有乐队指挥和击鼓声！

sentences.en: When you beat the drum, you feel good.

phrases.phrase: beat (或 bang) the drum of (或 for)

trans.tran_en: a musical instrument made of skin stretched over a circular frame, played by hitting it with your hand or a stick
to make a sound similar to a drum by hitting a surface again and again
